title: Radioactive Man: The Series
description: The original 1970s series featuring Radioactive Man and Fallout Boy protecting the innocent from all kinds of villains, including th elusive Scoutmaster.
altHero: superheroes Radioactive Man and his young sidekick Fallout Boy
alt1: boy scouts create a circle of fire around Radioactive Man and Fallout Boy
alt3: Fallout Boy swings on a rope kicking
alt4: the heroes have a victory dance party
